ActorTalk: Can something you've already seen... still make you feel that way?
So this is the surprise you were talking about?
It's a "surprise"... for both of us.
You were really lost in the moment just now, weren't you, Commandant?
Did you already have this dress in mind when you entered the keywords?
No, I just asked for something that held a special place in our memories.
Once I saw I was wearing it in the Dreamweaver, I understood right away.
Our memories chose it for us.
If we want this to be truly unique, then every detail matters.
[PlayerName], do you want to know why I saved it for the final keyword?
Because... I wanted to add more meaning to the vows we made in it.
"I vow to keep this miracle alive... until the end of time... or life itself."
Like you said once, if it's my wish, then it's okay to want a little more, isn't it?
The crowd watching wasn't enough. The church bells, even the sea of flowers weren't enough either.
Before I realized it, I wanted more to witness our vows. Everything we had still didn't feel like enough.
I wanted this dress to carry even more of our memories and hopes, in this little world that belongs only to us.
Then let it be part of our vows too. A constant reminder of everything we've shared.
It will still be with us, holding our memories.
You're not the only one who planned a surprise, Lucia. I've got something too.
I asked the staff for a little bonus. It's a floating camera from the Dreamweaver.
So now even more things are here to witness our vows?
Come on. Our dream is just getting started.
This dress...
It's breathtaking.
Because it means that much to me.
Because of our wedding.
Whatever the future holds, I fear nothing.
Now and forevermore.
No matter where we are, whether this moment belongs to the past or the future...
You can never have too many good memories.
